snippet.title: Barn Finders - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
It's finally here! The long awaited Barn Finders is now available on Steam with a 15% Launch discount!

Buy now on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/y9dy7d6f

That's not all! If you own one of the 12 most popular Playway games you'll get an extra 15% loyalty discount!

You can also choose one of 3 great bundles!

https://www.facebook.com/BarnFindersGame/
https://www.facebook.com/DualityGames/
http://dualitygames.eu
